roleset.name: provide money for, get money for

example.name: autogen1
example.text: The House Appropriations Committee approved an estimated $ 2.85 billion in emergency funding to assist California 's recovery from last week 's earthquake and to extend further aid to East Coast victims of Hurricane Hugo .
example.arg: to assist California 's recovery from last week 's earthquake and to extend further aid to East Coast victims of Hurricane Hugo

example.name: autogen2
example.text: federal funding of abortions for poor women who are vicitims of rape and incest
